```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

```{r}
sql <- "SELECT distinct ml.movie_id, title, production_year
FROM imdb.movie_link ml
JOIN imdb.aka_title t ON ml.movie_id = t.movie_id
WHERE kind_id  = 1 AND
(link_type_id = 1 OR 
link_type_id = 3 OR
link_type_id = 11 OR
link_type_id = 13 OR
link_type_id = 16);"

test <- db %>%
  dbGetQuery(sql)
head(test, n = 20)
```
